pr_title: DS-4412 Create Integration Tests to prove that users in the Administrators group get full Admin Rights

timeline.message: added IT to prove that an eperson has same rights when is part of admin group

timeline.bodyText: We might just want to call this new feature "administratorOf".  It seems to be checking whether you are an Administrator of a particular object (Community, Collection or Site).
timeline.author: tdonohue

timeline.bodyText: Just a note. A lot of these Converters get refactored/renamed in the (currently open) PR #2726.  So, depending on which PR is merged first (this one or that one), the other will require refactoring slightly.
timeline.author: tdonohue

timeline.message: renamed class AdministratorFeature to AdministratorOf and added description

timeline.bodyText:
Small clarification to my previous comment.  To align with other existing "Feature" classes, I'd recommend we name the class AdministratorOfFeature (or even revert back to AdministratorFeature which is OK as well), but keep the NAME property below as administratorOf.
These two names need not match, and in fact they often don't match in other Feature classes, e.g. https://github.com/DSpace/DSpace/blob/master/dspace-server-webapp/src/main/java/org/dspace/app/rest/authorization/impl/WithdrawFeature.java or https://github.com/DSpace/DSpace/blob/master/dspace-server-webapp/src/main/java/org/dspace/app/rest/authorization/impl/ReinstateFeature.java
timeline.author: tdonohue
